name: Jail Escape (EKSndk, Ariel)
description:
Escape from jail!
This game is a puzzle game in the style of Sokoban, but without grid-movement.

Move the boxes to the their place (The "X") to open the gate.
There are three unique levels not including the tutorial.

How to open the project:
open readme.txt, there should be a short explanation (We promise you it's short!)

Credits:
Programming - EKSndk
Pixelart and level design - Ariel
How to play:
Move  the player with wasd.
Move the boxes to the their place (The "X") to open the gate.
There are three unique levels and a tutorial.
